comment.author: 17783375@N03
comment._content: The young boy out the front is Charles? Johnny Stanton  who later became Johnny Mosselle. Johnny had joined up with Peter Small an English female impersonator and they formed the Mad Mosselles . Both had , at one time been comperes of the most famous drag show in the world, Les Girls. Their careers in drag were extensive

comment._content: That Drum Major is NOT square-gating. He's in the middle of a flourish with the mace.
